1051180.name: Vasilis Demo
1051180.description:
Welcome into the riot!

Vasilis demo in which you will visit the city and join riot events.
Demo contains first chapter of Vasilis in which you will be searching Vasilis's husband - Peter.
He took a part in Chern organization, that started revolution events.

Player will walk through Main avenue and visit hospital police station and government building.

Vasilis will meet the main riot groups and will get some basic start quests.
2/3 of game space will be locked in demo, but all basic mechanics will be there.

Vasilis based on political events of Ukraine of 2014 year.
